8888.description: The port used for the Jupyter Web Notebook.
8888.label: Notebook Port

/home/jovyan/work.description: Choose a volume for the Jupyter notebook files.
/home/jovyan/work.label: Jupyter Data

VIRTUAL_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name to add to the nginx proxy.
VIRTUAL_HOST.label: Virtual Host

LETSENCRYPT_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name for letsencrypt - likely the same as the virtual host.
LETSENCRYPT_HOST.label: Letsencrypt Host

VIRTUAL_PORT.description: Should be the same as the exposed port used by the Jupyter notebook to configure the virtual hosts entries in the Nginx proxy Rockon, if it's running.
VIRTUAL_PORT.label: Letsencrypt Port

LETSENCRYPT_TEST.description: Specify using letsencrypt test or production certificate generation.
LETSENCRYPT_TEST.label: Letsencrypt test(true/false)

NB_UID.description: Specify the uid of the jupyter notebook data.
NB_UID.label: Notebook UID

NB_GID.description: Specify the gid of the jupyter notebook data.
NB_GID.label: Notebook GID

Jupyter Scipy notebook (NXR).more_info: Note, This is designed to work with the Nginx Reverse proxy.
